official_title: A joint resolution designating "God Bless America" as the national hymn of the United States.

summary.text: Designates the composition known as "God Bless America" as the national hymn of the United States. Declares that this designation shall not be construed to repeal or affect the Act designating the Star-Spangled Banner as the national anthem.

titles.title: A joint resolution designating "God Bless America" as the national hymn of the United States.
